pages.privacy-policy: SilverShores Privacy Policy - Protecting Your Personal Data SilverShores HOME ABOUT US Casino Contact SilverShores Privacy Policy At SilverShores, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information. Information We Collect We may collect the following types of personal information: - Contact details (such as name, email address, phone number) - Demographic information (such as age, gender, location) - Payment information (credit card details, billing address) for bookings - Information you provide through communications with us (emails, phone calls) Use of Your Information We may use your personal information for the following purposes: - To provide and personalize our services to you - To process your bookings and payments - To communicate with you, including responding to your inquiries - To improve our services and website functionality Data Protection We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. Disclosure of Information We may disclose your personal information to third parties in the following circumstances: - With your consent - To comply with legal obligations or enforce our policies - To protect the rights, property, or safety of SilverShores, our customers, or others SilverShores website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our site. Bookings and Reservations Bookings are subject to availability and confirmation. Payment details and cancellation policies apply as specified during the booking process. Payments Payment is required in full at the time of booking unless otherwise specified. We accept major credit cards and other specified payment methods. Cancellation and Refunds Cancellation policies vary by booking type and are outlined during the booking process. Refunds, if applicable, are subject to the cancellation policy in effect at the time of cancellation. Use of Website You agree to use SilverShores' website only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms and Conditions.
